subject: $59.95 Dreamweaver
body:
Do not be afraid of defeat. You are never so near to victory as when defeated in a good cause.

It's good to be clever, but not to show it.

Decide that you really want to achieve the goal...

No one as ever completed their apprenticeship.

Never underestimate your problem or your ability to deal with it.

If you take all the experience and judgment of men over fifty out of the world, there wouldn't be enough left to run it.

It is a wise father that knows his own child.

Man should forget his anger before he lies down to sleep.

If you wish to be loved Love!

Those whom true love has held, it will go on holding.

Education is what you get from reading the fine print. Experience is what you get from not reading it.

You can set yourself up to be sick, or you can choose to stay well.

Simply the thing I am shall make me live.
